devdoc.details: Stores aggregated sentiment scores per token pushed from an offchain AI engine.      Scores are integers representing the sentiment * 100 (e.g., +75 = 0.75, -42 = -0.42).      Designed to be minimal and hackathon-ready on Monad Testnet.

params.score: The new sentiment score (scaled by 100, range: -100 to +100)

devdoc.title: SentimentOracle

SentimentUpdated(string,int256).notice: Emitted when a sentiment score is updated

getSentiment(string).notice: Read the latest sentiment score for a given token

sentimentScores(string).notice: Mapping from token symbol to its latest sentiment score (scaled by 100)

updateSentiment(string,int256).notice: Update the sentiment score for a given token

userdoc.notice: AI-Powered Onchain Sentiment Oracle for SentimentFi
